destinations.subtitle: Travel abroad, have fun, study, connect with new cultures, make friends, and live unique experiences.

hero.subtitle: More than a trip, a transformation.

certifications.title: We-Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Certify your future with international standards.
certifications.text: In Weglon we guide you step by step to obtain official certifications recognized by national and international institutions.

platform.title: Anglolinguist
platform.subtitle: Designed to help students from beginner to advanced level verify their English level aligned with the Common European Framework (CEFR)

centers.title: Associated Educational Centers
centers.subtitle: Turn your school into a certification center

footer.aboutText1: At WEGLON we have a professional and trained team to make your trip and certification process an unforgettable experience.
footer.aboutText2: We have a team of experts in international education. We are committed to training world leaders for the development of our country, introducing the culture of other countries, promoting leadership and teamwork through a global perspective.
